name: (Dream) Quest
description:
A short story that I wrote for an assignment about experimental and revisionary literature. It's apparently about nostalgia and climate change and the destructive ends of trying to recapture some past glory.

Or it's a fun short story based on Dream-Quest of Unknown Kadath that follows you, yes you, on your journey to find a grand and golden city (that ultimately represents the lie of nostalgia so maybe my teacher was onto something).

Photo by Anastasia Zhenina from Pexels, edited by me.
